tool_description: Free API - 50M+ Linkedin Companies Data More than 50M Linkedin Companies  Data
title: Linkedin Companies Data

api_list.name: Company

parameters.name: vanity_name
parameters.description:
Company vanityName in Linkedin

https://www.linkedin.com/company/**(vanityName)**

Examples:
https://www.linkedin.com/company/microsoft --> microsoft
https://www.linkedin.com/company/adobe --> adobe
https://www.linkedin.com/company/att-> att

utterances.utterance: Can you provide me with the LinkedIn data for Microsoft?
I need the LinkedIn company data for Adobe.
Fetch the LinkedIn information for the company AT&T.
What is the LinkedIn profile data for Google?
Retrieve the LinkedIn company details for Tesla.
Get me the LinkedIn data for the company IBM.
I want to see the LinkedIn information for Netflix.
Please provide the LinkedIn company data for Amazon.
Can you get the LinkedIn details for Facebook?
Show me the LinkedIn profile data for Apple.
